org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist.adapter
Class ValidOnlyIndividualFormRowHandler<K,R>

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist.adapter.DefaultFormRowHandler<K,R>
      org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist.adapter.ValidOnlyFormRowHandler<K,R>

All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, FormRowHandler<K,R>, RowHandler<K,R>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ValidOnlyIndividualBeanFormRowHandler
public abstract class ValidOnlyIndividualFormRowHandler<K,R>
extends ValidOnlyFormRowHandler<K,R>

A more precise form row handler that narrows rows handling down to only adding, saving and deleting valid rows one-by-one.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov@araneaframework.org)
See Also:

saveValidRows

public void saveValidRows(Map<K,FormRow<K,R>> rowForms)
                   throws Exception
Description copied from class: ValidOnlyFormRowHandler
This method is called by ValidOnlyFormRowHandler.saveRows(Map) to save only valid rows. The implementation of this method should save the row form data into a persistent data source.

Overrides:
saveValidRows in class ValidOnlyFormRowHandler<K,R>
Parameters:
rowForms - The forms data from rows to be save into a persistent data source.
Throws:
Exception - Any exception that might occur during saving the data.

Description copied from interface: FormRowHandler
This method is called when the rows (specified by the keys in the supplied set) should be deleted.

Specified by:
deleteRows in interface FormRowHandler<K,R>
Overrides:
deleteRows in class DefaultFormRowHandler<K,R>
Parameters:

saveValidRow

public void saveValidRow(FormRow<K,R> formRow)
                  throws Exception
This method is called by saveValidRows(Map) to save only one valid row. The implementation of this method should save the form row data in a persistent data source.

Parameters:
formRow - The form row data to add into a persistent data source.
Throws:
Exception - Any exception that might occur during saving the data.

deleteRow

public void deleteRow(K key)
               throws Exception
This method is called by deleteRows(Set) to delete only one row. The implementation of this method should delete the row identified by the given key from a persistent data source.

Parameters:
key - The key (unique identifier) of the row that is to be deleted from the persistent data source.
Throws:
Exception - Any exception that might occur during deleting the data.
